=== About me ===
I'm a computer science student from Romania and a member of the <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/RomanianTeam/|Ubuntu Romanian Local Team]]</nowiki> <<BR>>
I used Linux for the first time in 2004 and I've been loving it ever since. My first encounter with Ubuntu happen in 2004 when I received 10 Dapper Drake CDs.<<BR>>
As a student I learned many programming languages but mostly I use PHP and Python for my projects. I also like digital electronics and working with microcontrollers.<<BR>>
I own a '89 Volvo 340, currently the second thing I love.
